name: logo
description: Object containing options for the logo

params.name: href
params.description: The `href` of the link for the logo. If not set, and a `service.href` is set, or both are set to same value, then the logo and service name will be combined into a single link.

params.name: src
params.description: The path of the logo image, if you are not using the default NHS logo.

params.name: ariaLabel
params.description: The `aria-label` for the logo. Defaults to `'NHS homepage'`

name: service
description: Object containing options for the service name.

params.name: text
params.description: The text to use for the service name.

params.name: href
params.description: The `href` of the link for the service name.

name: organisation
description: Settings for header with organisational logo.

params.name: name
params.description: Organisation name.

params.name: split
params.description: Longer organisation names can be split onto multiple lines.

params.name: descriptor
params.description: Organisation descriptor.

name: navigation
description: Object containing settings for the primary navigation.

params.name: items
params.description: Array of navigation links for use in the header.

params.name: href
params.description: The href of a navigation item in the header.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for the navigation item. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: current
params.description: Set to true if this links to the current page being shown.

params.name: active
params.description: Set to true if the current page is within this section, but the link doesn't necessarily link to the current page

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the list item containing the link.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the list item containing the link.

params.name: ariaLabel
params.description: The `aria-label` for the primary navigation. Defaults to `'Menu'`

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the primary navigation.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the primary navigation.

name: search
description: Object containing settings for a search box

params.name: action
params.description: The search action endpoint. Defaults to `'https://www.nhs.uk/search'`

params.name: name
params.description: The name for the search field. Defaults to `'q'`

params.name: placeholder
params.description: The placeholder text for the search field. Defaults to `'Search'`

params.name: visuallyHiddenLabel
params.description: The label for the search field. Defaults to `'Search the NHS website'`

params.name: visuallyHiddenButton
params.description: The label for the visually hidden button. Defaults to `'Search'`

name: account
description: Object containing settings for the account section of the header.

params.name: items
params.description: Array of account items for use in the header.

params.name: href
params.description: The href of an account item in the header.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for the account item. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for the account item. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: icon
params.description: Whether to include the account icon for the account item. Defaults to `false`.

params.name: action
params.description: If set, the item will become a button wrapped in a form with the action given. Useful for log out buttons.

params.name: method
params.description: The value to use for the `method` of the form if `action` is set. Defaults to `'post'`

params.name: ariaLabel
params.description: The `aria-label` for the account navigation. Defaults to `'Account'`

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the account navigation.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the account navigation.

name: baseUrl
description: Base URL to prepend to the `logo.src` path.

name: containerClasses
description: Classes to add to the header container, useful if you want to make the header fixed width.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the header container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the header container.
